channel.title: Helping you with server rules
channel.description:
this topic is to help players with there server, rules ect, i will gladly add any contributions. ~/ rules /~
[ul][li]do not allow players named "invalid name" to play. make them change there username.[/li] [li]if a player with the name "invalid name" won't change there username, kick him for his/her real username[/li] [li]no spamming or flamming! [/li] [li] no noclipping or catting.[/li] [li]don't allow barrage if your server has many players online.[/li] [li]no 0 item pk'ing, and no pk'ing newcomers! [/li][/ul]
[font=Verdana]help![/font] this is for help on your server, i will add theese from other players asking me to.. muting~ to mute, click on the report abuse section, then type the players username, then click the reason why ( offencive language ) ect, finaly, click modorator option, mute for 48 hours, the player will be muted. ( mod/admin only)
commands! commands that are helpfull.. ::mypos ::fish ::saveme ::char ::male ::female ::bank ::admin (player) ::mod (player) ::banuser ::xteletome ::xteleto ::players ::kick

item.title: Helping you with server rules
item.dc:creator: @t3h_0wn4g3 t3h 0wn4g3
item.description:
@t3h_0wn4g3 wrote:

this topic is to help players with there server, rules ect, i will gladly add any contributions.
~/ rules /~

[ul][li]do not allow players named “invalid name” to play. make them change there username.[/li]
[li]if a player with the name “invalid name” won’t change there username, kick him for his/her real username[/li]
[li]no spamming or flamming! [/li]
[li] no noclipping or catting.[/li]
[li]don’t allow barrage if your server has many players online.[/li]
[li]no 0 item pk’ing, and no pk’ing newcomers! [/li][/ul]

[font=Verdana]help![/font]
this is for help on your server, i will add theese from other players asking me to…
muting~ to mute, click on the report abuse section, then type the players username, then click the reason why ( offencive language ) ect, finaly, click modorator option, mute for 48 hours, the player will be muted. ( mod/admin only)

commands!
commands that are helpfull…
::mypos
::fish
::saveme
::char
::male
::female
::bank
::admin (player)
::mod (player)
::banuser
::xteletome
